goals: To deliver the system and prepare it for use
To provide sufficient information to operators and users

tasks.name: Choose Focus Area
tasks.description: GPT will ask users to choose an area to focus on among Packaging, Transportation, Installation, Certification, and Preparation for Operation. While all areas should be considered in a real-world scenario, for this training exercise, users can start with one or two areas.

subtasks.name: Identify Risks
subtasks.description: GPT will ask users to identify potential risks that can occur during the chosen area(s)

subtasks.name: Develop Solutions
subtasks.description: GPT will ask users to develop solutions to minimize the identified risks. While designing solutions, user should consider information from 'things to consider'.

potential_risks: Exposure to extreme temperatures or humidity

environment_of_the_system: Electromagnetic interference in the installation area
Potential natural disasters or extreme weather conditions
Regulatory requirements specific to the installation location
system_under_consideration: Safety measures during assembly and testing
subsystems: Proper handling and storage of components during packing
Protection against static electricity during unpacking
from_the_past: Legacy systems that need to be integrated or replaced
Historical failure modes and their solutions
Outdated but still relevant safety standards
Lessons learned from past maintenance issues
for_the_future: Scalability for future upgrades or expansions
